sentence: What do you call a herpes pun? a play on warts
explanation: A warts is a small, fleshy bump on the skin caused by a virus.
first_new_sentence: The warts on his skin needed to be treated by a dermatologist.
second_new_sentence: The court dealt with the issue of warts of law that were not effectively addressed.

sentence: Why do cannibals make suitcases out of peoples heads? because theyre headcases!
explanation: The head is the top part of the body that contains the brain.
first_new_sentence: His head was spinning from all the information he had to digest.
second_new_sentence: The head of the committee announced the plans for the next meeting.

sentence: What do they say for jokes about german sausages? they are the wurst.
explanation: Wurst is a type of German sausage.
first_new_sentence: The wurst I tasted at the festival was outstanding.
second_new_sentence: The wurst part of the job was the long commute each day.

sentence: Each joke is accompanied by two serious sentences that reflect the dual meanings of the words involved in the jokes.
